Name: The Saint
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of quarter grapefruit slice wheel.
Garnish with quarter grapefruit wheel on rim.
Review: A riff on the classic Brown Derby , this is a refreshing bourbon sour with zesty citrus and subtle warming earthy ginger.
History: Created in 2015 by Karen Grill at Sassafras Saloon in Los Angeles, California.
Nutrition: One serving of The Saint contains 178 calories
